name: Final Faggot I
description:
Final Faggot is a comedy JRPG franchise made as a personal project by the ASCU™

Daniel wakes up and realizes that he needs to take a shit. What starts as a normal day for a college student in Southern California slowly turns into something much more sinister.

CONTENT WARNING: This is THE MOST brain-dead video game you will ever touch! Play at your own risk!
